scenario_text.value:
I found it! That thing from before! It’s
right over there, no doubt about it.

What should I do? It doesn’t look hostile,
but still...

Man, did it vanish again? This thing’s quick
on it’s feet...at least, I think it has feet.
I’ll survey other spots with my <color=#B41919>camera</color>.
I’ll survey other spots with my camera.
